member.summary: Allows for easy scalar query execution over a UnitOfWorkContext.

member.name: M:TextMetal.WebHostSample.Objects.Model.DatabaseHistory.PerformSchemaUpgrade(TextMetal.Plumbing.CommonFacilities.UnitOfWorkContext)
member.summary: For a given UnitOfWorkContext, perform a schema upgrade if necessary. The ordered set of revisions are executed from version+1 to version[n].
member.returns: A value indicating whether any changes were needed against the target database (file).

member.summary: Gets or sets the SQL required to determine if schema tracking is enabled in the database (file).
